TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase

summary.span: 将对象图序列化为一系列 CodeDOM 语句。

span.span: Serializes an object graph to a series of CodeDOM statements.

summary.span: 此类提供序列化程序的抽象基类。

span.span: This class provides an abstract base class for a serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以实现一个自定义来控制为类型的组件在设计时的组件初始化代码生成。You can implement a custom to control the generation of component initialization code for a type of component at design time. 若要实现一个自定义对于类型，你必须：To implement a custom for a type, you must: 1. 定义一个从 派生的类。Define a class that derives from . 2. 实现序列化或反序列化方法的方法重写。Implement method overrides for serialization or deserialization methods. （请参阅下面有关详细信息的信息。）(See the information below for details.) 3. 将您的自定义关联实施了一种类型的组件使用。Associate your custom implementation with a type of component using a . 若要实现组件的配置代码的生成的序列化方法：To implement a serialization method for generating configuration code for a component: 1. 类派生自内部、 重写适当的序列化或反序列化的类的基类的方法。Within a class that derives from , override an appropriate serialization or deserialization method of the base class. 2. 如果你想要生成代码语句，执行默认组件配置默认序列化程序，你必须获取并组件调用基序列化程序。If you want the default serializer to generate code statements that perform the default component configuration, you must obtain and call the base serializer for the component. 若要获取该组件的基序列化程序，调用方法传递给方法重写。To obtain the base serializer for the component, call the method of the passed to your method override. 传递方法要序列化的配置，以及序列化程序的请求时，即的基类型的组件类型。Pass the method the type of the component to serialize the configuration of, along with the base type of serializer you are requesting, which is . 调用基序列化程序，使用您要重写具有相同名称的方法和对象传递给你的方法重写。Call the method of the same name you are overriding on the base serializer, using the and object passed to your method override. 如果你要实现方法，的基序列化程序的方法将返回的对象。If you are implementing the method, the method of the base serializer will return an object. 此对象的类型取决于基的序列化程序，具体取决于您要序列化的值的组件的类型的类型。The type of this object depends on the type of base serializer which depends on the type of component you are serializing the values of. 如果你要实现， ，或方法，必须创建新包含生成的代码语句，并将其传递给该方法。If you are implementing the , , or method, you must create a new to contain the generated code statements, and pass it to the method. 3. 如果你调用了基序列化程序方法，则必须，其中包含要为初始化组件而生成的语句。If you have called a base serializer method, you will have a that contains the statements to generate to initialize the component. 否则，您应创建。Otherwise you should create a . 你可以添加表示语句，以向此集合的组件配置代码中生成的对象。You can add objects representing statements to generate in the component configuration code to this collection. 4. 返回，表示要为配置组件而生成的源代码。Return the that represents the source code to generate to configure the component. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义的 CodeDOM 序列化派生自。The following code example illustrates how to create a custom CodeDOM serializer that derives from . [!code-cpp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CPP/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CS/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/VB/idesignerserializationmanagersample.vb#1)]

span.para: 继承自，必须重写以下成员：和。
When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等效于调用，只不过它将返回对象实例，如果结果语句为变量赋值语句、 具有初始化表达式或字段赋值语句的变量声明。The is equivalent of calling , except that it returns an object instance if the resulting statement was a variable assign statement, a variable declaration with an init expression, or a field assignment statement.

summary.span: 将指定值序列化为 CodeDOM 表达式。

span.span: Serializes the specified value to a CodeDOM expression.
The serialized value.

returns.span: 如果无法获得指定值的引用表达式，或者无法序列化该值，则该方法返回 。

span.span: This returns if no reference expression can be obtained for the specified value, or the value cannot be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法类似于是，只不过它将停止如果它无法获取值的简单引用表达式。This method is similar to , except that it stops if it cannot obtain a simple reference expression for the value. 当你需要生成的表达式用作参数或语句的目标，请调用此方法。Call this method when you expect the resulting expression to be used as a parameter or target of a statement.
